description:
Here is a very special treat… Since I started posting our extra weekly Casting Couch updates people have been asking about the first 5 “test” shoots that Matt & I did before the full approval. Well up until today, they were only available on KOD… Till today….

For years we’ve been conducting interviews and getting pictures from local models who apply to work with us. So we decided to tape this process and add another element.

Often, you’ll see a girl naked, and she’ll tell you she can do bondage, yet it’s really not the case. So, we decided that the very first time a girl came into an interview we were going to tie her up, leave her alone to struggle for a few minutes, then go in and make her cum!

If a girl can handle that in their first 15 minutes inside our building, they might make a real Kink.com model. If not, we save a lot of time and money.

Check out these real local girls at Kink.com for their first on-camera interview and bondage scene. Which ones will be good enough to go on to one of our premium sites?
title: Casting Couch 1 Kink.com tapes an actual casting call: Realism at its best!
